gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2
Interface Model.AddContext

All Superinterfaces:
Model.AddSubject
Enclosing interface:
Model
public static interface Model.AddContext
extends Model.AddSubject

The initial builder of a triple addition, which allows the user to define either the named graph or the subject (implying the use of the default named graph) of the to-be-added triple.

See Also:
for examples

Method Detail

g

Model.AddSubject g(Resource namedGraph)
Declares that the to-be-added triple should be in the specified named graph.

Parameters:
namedGraph - the named graph which will include the to-be-added triple
Returns:
an object to handle the rest of the procedure of the triple addition
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the specified node does not belong to the model into which the triple is to be added. See RdfNode.mappedTo(Model) for a way to translate a node of a model to a node of another
See Also:
for examples

g

Model.AddSubject g(String uri)
Declares that the to-be-added triple should be in the specified named graph.

This method is equivalent to g(model.mapResource(uri))

Parameters:
uri - the named graph which will include the to-be-added triple
Returns:
an object to handle the rest of the procedure of the triple addition
Throws:
Uri.UriFormatException - if Model.mapResource(String) throws this exception

g

This method is equivalent to g(model.mapResource(uri))

Parameters:
uri - the named graph which will include the to-be-added triple
Returns:
an object to handle the rest of the procedure of the triple addition
